channel.title: Range Help
channel.description:
well i on a delta and when you range and mage you run up to the person/npc i fixed this easily on a pi. But for some reason on a delta i cant even find where its handled if anyone could tell me i would appreciate it alot.
[size=12pt]And If You Dont Know Dont Post! I See People Post Whore This Sections On Things They Dont Even Know About.[/size]
